name: Furina
desc:
"Endless Solo of Solitude" Furina

Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc:
"Endless Solo of Solitude" Furina

Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Oh, so you're my opponent this time around? Excellent, this will be a thrilling match!"
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Furina's deck has "HP Change" as its theme. Her Character Cards and Action Cards all have the potential to benefit from "HP Changes."</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc:
"Endless Solo of Solitude" Furina

Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.

customize.name: Lyney
customize.desc:
"Spectacle of Phantasmagoria" Lyney

Those flowers in the mirror... who are they for?

customize.name: Neuvillette
customize.desc:
"Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment" Neuvillette

He who looks down on all that are haughty.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

"Let the world come alive, hehe!"

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
customize.desc:
Furina: Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!

"Let the world come alive, hehe!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Huh... I didn't think there'd be so many tricks to playing cards! Very well, I acknowledge your skill... Now then, show me more!"
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Furina" starts with the Talent Card "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!" equipped.</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

value.name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
value.desc:
Furina: Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!

"Let the world come alive, hehe!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Furina to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Furina
value.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Once per Round:</color> If you do not have <color=#ffffff>Seats Sacred and Secular</color> in your Hand, create 1 <color=#ffffff>Seats Sacred and Secular</color> card in your Hand.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
<color=#ffffff>Furina</color> is currently in the Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons <color=#ffffff>Salon Members</color> .
(When Furina is in the Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon <color=#ffffff>Singer of Many Waters</color> instead)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Universal Revelry</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Universal Revelry</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After your active character takes DMG or is healed:</color> Add 1 stack of <color=#ffffff>Revelry</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Revelry</color>
Your side deals +1 DMG. (Including Swirl DMG triggered by Characters)
<color=#ffffff>Usages: 1</color> (Can stack. No stack limit)

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When battle begins, create 1 <color=#ffffff>Seats Sacred and Secular</color> card in your Hand.

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
When in Arkhe: Pneuma or Arkhe: Ousia states, switch Furina's state.
If you have <color=#ffffff>Salon Members</color> or <color=#ffffff>Singer of Many Waters</color> on the field, change their state as well.

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> . If your side has characters with at least 6 HP, deal 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to your character who has taken the least DMG, and deal another 1 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP. If your side has characters with no more than 5 HP, heal the most injured character for an additional 1 HP.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
